pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Xp or later
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 Super or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Xp or later
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 Super or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
